abstract: The banking giant asked a judge to move the Madoff trustee’s lawsuit from bankruptcy court to federal court, calling the $6.4 billion complaint an “enormous backdoor class action.”
snippet: The banking giant asked a judge to move the Madoff trustee’s lawsuit from bankruptcy court to federal court, calling the $6.4 billion complaint an “enormous backdoor class action.”
lead_paragraph: No one thought that JPMorgan Chase was going to take the claims of the trustee representing the victims of Bernard L. Madoff‘s Ponzi scheme lying down, and it hasn’t disappointed.

headline.main: JPMorgan Asks to Move Madoff Trustee’s Lawsuit
